description:
You are biodiverse, many creatures inside of you are working in synergy. You are nature. In nature it's the same. Trees, plants, fungi, animals, we need each other in order to be healthy and wealthy.

AYA nature buys monoculture land and transforms it into a **biodiverse paradise** so the senses of all creatures can flourish!

Thank you for your beautiful senses! 

**Become a Badger:** Help us help nature by collecting badges, donating or by winning/buying Limited Edition AYA NFTs.

Everyday is wonderful!
Love,
AYA Nature
name: Daily Wisdom #1 **Biodiversity rules**
